definition: a process that aims to end an argument between people or groups
attempts to end a problem between two or more people or groups who disagree by talking to them and trying to find things that everyone can agree on
the process of influencing something and/or make it possible for it to happen
a very large dinosaur with a long thin neck and tail

a file and the information it contains, for example about a particular person or subject

a metal tool with a rough surface for cutting or shaping hard substances or for making them smooth

(in) one line, one behind the other

something that has been cancelled
